Author: aiczk
Name: Astro
Changelog:
I felt that Astro was interfering with other jobs, so I modified it to apply only when I was an astrologian.
Added a description to readme.md on github about the problem that Astro removes type-ahead.
The crashing issue is known and we would like to work positively on the fix.
I'm waiting for a bug report. Thank you for using Astro.
